trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Goodlettsville
There was one other sighting in Goodlettsville on or around July 14th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsPlaying music about to go outside to smoke a cig.my friend yelled at me to come lookat the light in the sky. It was very bright and moved very quickly. Was traveling west Then turned sharply south. When turned in our direction was extremely bright. We were less than a mile from the object. Pardon my grammar typed on ipad quickly. Very weird sensation from this siting. We lost sight due to tree line.
Summary: Very bright, pulsating light. Able to change directions quickly.
